body_html:
I had run into this issue today when I'm using Google Colab.

So I try to write like this:

    try:
      summary_writer
    except NameError:
      summary_writer = tf.contrib.summary.create_file_writer('./data/tensorboard')

but it did not resolve the problem.

body:
I had run into this issue today when I'm using Google Colab.

So I try to write like this:

```python
    try:
      summary_writer
    except NameError:
      summary_writer = tf.contrib.summary.create_file_writer('./data/tensorboard')
```

but it did not resolve the problem.
